[Home](./index.md) &gt; [deconstruct-js](./deconstruct-js.md)

## deconstruct-js package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [after(previous, innerFn)](./deconstruct-js.after.md) | Lets you analyze previous bytes to declare an appropiate Deconstructor for the following ones. |
|  [flags(flagNames)](./deconstruct-js.flags.md) | Lets you decode a series of <code>0</code>s and <code>1</code>s into a Record of <code>boolean</code>s |
|  [fromBuffer(deconstructor, input, offset)](./deconstruct-js.frombuffer.md) | Executes a Deconstructor on a Buffer, and returns its result |
|  [list(deconstructor, times)](./deconstruct-js.list.md) | Repeats a deconstructor a number of times, or as much as possible if not given |
|  [magicNumber(value)](./deconstruct-js.magicnumber.md) | Extract a specific sequence of bytes. Errors if they don't match |
|  [maybe(inner, defaultValue)](./deconstruct-js.maybe.md) | Applies a deconstructor, returns the default value if it fails |
|  [raw(bytes)](./deconstruct-js.raw.md) | Extracts a sub-range of bytes |
|  [rawUntil(value)](./deconstruct-js.rawuntil.md) | Extracts a sub-range of bytes |
|  [skip(bytes)](./deconstruct-js.skip.md) | Extracts a specific number of bytes and ignores them |
|  [string(bytes, encoding)](./deconstruct-js.string.md) | Extracts a specific number of bytes and tries to decode them with the given encoding |
|  [stringUntil(value, encoding)](./deconstruct-js.stringuntil.md) | Read a string until it hits a specific value |
|  [struct()](./deconstruct-js.struct.md) | Provides facilities to extract an object of different, named values. |
|  [structPairs(pairs)](./deconstruct-js.structpairs.md) | Returns an object with the given key-value pairs |
|  [transform(inner, transformFn)](./deconstruct-js.transform.md) | Creates a new Deconstructor that transforms the value returned by the previous one |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ComplexDeconstructor](./deconstruct-js.complexdeconstructor.md) | The object or instance returned by your function, with information on the deconstructor and the deconstructor value, if it contains more than one value. |
|  [Deconstruction](./deconstruct-js.deconstruction.md) | Result of a deconstructed buffer |
|  [Deconstructor](./deconstruct-js.deconstructor.md) | The object or instance returned by your function, with information on the deconstructor and the deconstructor value. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [boolean](./deconstruct-js.boolean.md) | Reads a <code>0</code> or a <code>1</code> and returns a <code>boolean</code> |
|  [empty](./deconstruct-js.empty.md) | Returns a Deconstructor that doesn't do anything - a noop. Useful for testing and internals. |
|  [f32BE](./deconstruct-js.f32be.md) | Extracts an big-endian 32-bit float |
|  [f32LE](./deconstruct-js.f32le.md) | Extracts an little-endian 32-bit float |
|  [f64BE](./deconstruct-js.f64be.md) | Extracts an big-endian 64-bit float (double) |
|  [f64LE](./deconstruct-js.f64le.md) | Extracts an little-endian 64-bit float (double) |
|  [i16BE](./deconstruct-js.i16be.md) | Extracts an big-endian signed 16-bit integer |
|  [i16LE](./deconstruct-js.i16le.md) | Extracts an little-endian signed 16-bit integer |
|  [i32BE](./deconstruct-js.i32be.md) | Extracts an big-endian signed 32-bit integer |
|  [i32LE](./deconstruct-js.i32le.md) | Extracts an little-endian signed 32-bit integer |
|  [i64BE](./deconstruct-js.i64be.md) | Extracts an big-endian signed 64-bit BigInt |
|  [i64LE](./deconstruct-js.i64le.md) | Extracts an little-endian signed 64-bit BigInt |
|  [i8](./deconstruct-js.i8.md) | Extracts an signed 8-bit integer |
|  [u16BE](./deconstruct-js.u16be.md) | Extracts an big-endian unsigned 16-bit integer |
|  [u16LE](./deconstruct-js.u16le.md) | Extracts an little-endian unsigned 16-bit integer |
|  [u32BE](./deconstruct-js.u32be.md) | Extracts an big-endian unsigned 32-bit integer |
|  [u32LE](./deconstruct-js.u32le.md) | Extracts an little-endian unsigned 32-bit integer |
|  [u64BE](./deconstruct-js.u64be.md) | Extracts an big-endian unsigned 64-bit BigInt |
|  [u64LE](./deconstruct-js.u64le.md) | Extracts an little-endian unsigned 64-bit BigInt |
|  [u8](./deconstruct-js.u8.md) | Extracts an unsigned 8-bit integer |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [StaticDeconstructor](./deconstruct-js.staticdeconstructor.md) | This is a Deconstructor which you can call or use as-is |
|  [StructDeconstructor](./deconstruct-js.structdeconstructor.md) | Dynamic deconstructor that represents a struct |
